      • createUser

        public User createUser​(java.lang.String user_email,
                       java.lang.String password1,
                       java.lang.String password2)
                throws LoginSampleException,
                       UserExists,
                       InvalidPassword
        Create a user from the registration page
        Parameters:
        user_email -
        password1 - needs to be the same as password2
        password2 - needs to be the same as password1
        Returns:
        User that is signing up
        Throws:
        LoginSampleException - A custom made exception message
        UserExists - User is already registered in the DB
        InvalidPassword - Passwords do not match
